title: The Charm of Barranco & Pre Inca Pyramid (5* Tour)
description: See Lima from a different perspective during a bike tour that covers sights between Miraflores and Barranco. As well as receiving personalized attention in a small group limited to eight, avoid waiting time in traffic jams and enjoy the flexibility to stop and go without the hassle of parking.
all_descriptions: See Lima from a different perspective during a bike tour that covers sights between Miraflores and Barranco. As well as receiving personalized attention in a small group limited to eight, avoid waiting time in traffic jams and enjoy the flexibility to stop and go without the hassle of parking.

Arequipa 5001, Miraflores 15074, PeruOur lovely bike shop in MirafloresDuration: 15 minutesPass By:Miraflores Boardwalk, Malecon de la Reserva 275, Lima 15074 PeruEl Malecon de Miraflores and Park of LovePass By:Parque Kennedy - Parque Central de Miraflores, Lima 15074 PeruCentrally located park in Miraflores neighborhoodPass By:Cristo del Pacifico, Morro Solar, Chorrillos PeruWe'll see this iconic statue in ChorrillosPass By:El Parque del Amor, Malecon Cisneros 18, Lima PeruThe most romanctic place in Lima is awaiting for you! Park of Love
End:This activity ends back at the meeting point.

reviews.title: Best time !!!
reviews.text: Had an amazing experience !! would highly recommend . I suggest that you should do this bike tour on your first or second day of being in Lima Peru you got to see so much.

reviews.title: A great way of seeing Lima
reviews.text: We saw a small group of cyclists with a guide in the Barranco district  of Lima and spoke to the guide deciding we would do the bike tour with them the next day which we duly did. It was tricky finding the start of the tour as it is in a market area and the gates were locked so we were directed around rather block. Eventually we found it and provided with good,sturdy bikes opting for helmets and met Diego again. We set off for the pyramid using the cycle lanes which felt very safe. The pyramid looked amazing right in the centre of a built up area. We then rode to the lovers view, via Miraflores then to Barranco district. We opted for an extension to the Christ statue and cross on the hill.It was all very flat and Diego was excellent with his knowledge of the history of the districts, city of Lima and Peru- it was a tour I would heavily recommend.

reviews.title: Excellent bike tour of Lima
reviews.text: Excellent bike tour of the Miraflores and Barranco areas of Lima. We visited the pre-Inca pyramid, a beautiful park on the coast (parc de lâamour) and the charming neighborhood of Barranco. Most of the route was on dedicated bike paths or bike lanes, and the route was easy and relatively flat. Our guide (Diego) was very knowledgeable and provided commentary in English and Spanish. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Great bike tour
reviews.text: Great way to spend an afternoon, our guide Diego was the best and was happy to answer any questions or just chat. Skillfully guided us through the area and bought us some of the best gelato.  Highly recommended

reviews.title: Knowledgeable Guide and Good Bikes
reviews.text: Very knowledgeable guide! He was able to describe the history and politics of Peru and could put what we saw in context. Good quality bikes too!

reviews.title: Great biking in Lima
reviews.text: Great tour with an enthousiastic host who was professional and also funny. We learned a lot of history in a relaxed way. We enjoyed it very much. Thank you!

reviews.title: Easy cycle
reviews.text: Guide was very good and the drink was a nice touch. I would have liked to do a bit more cycling but apart from that all good and enjoyed

reviews.title: Awesome tour of Barranco
reviews.text: The Fall in Love with Barranco tour was an awesome experience. First of all, because our flight was 2 hours late from Juliaca, Beto worked with us to reschedule the tour for an hour and 15 minutes later. Then Choji took it from there and led our family on the absolute highlight of our time in Limaâ¦he was simply fantastic and sent us a bunch of pictures. Highly recommend GOGO Biking and especially Choji!

reviews.title: Worth it!!
reviews.text: we spent our last afternoon in Peru on this bike tourâ it was a beautiful day and a fun way to zip around and see the Miraflores and Barranco neighborhoods while getting a little bit of history that we wouldnât have gotten on our own. Very safe annd comfy bikes,  informative and fun guide! ( but not tooo chatty that it stoped us up from scooting around and seeing lots of beautiful spots)  totally recommend you add this to your Lima to-do list.

reviews.title: Fun bike ride!
reviews.text: Really enjoyed the bike tour, good quality bikes, our guide Kral was great, very easy riding, mostly on bike routes. Very fun!
